snippet: Behind the Bollywood dream of the Great Indian Wedding, complete with white horse and brass bands, the reality for many Indian women is stark: there isn't much alternative to marriage. Does it have to be this way for the next generation?
abstract: Behind the Bollywood dream of the Great Indian Wedding, complete with white horse and brass bands, the reality for many Indian women is stark: there isn't much alternative to marriage. Does it have to be this way for the next generation?

headline.main: Will Indian Women Ever Have the Freedom Not to Marry?
